trans-unit.source: Using the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools with the Network Server

target.mrk: Using the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools with the Network Server

trans-unit.source: The <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools <codeph>ij</codeph> and <codeph>dblook</codeph> work in embedded mode and client/server mode.
